mapper.sql: id, chinese_name, english_name, asset_code, rated_uph, rated_voltage, rated_power, rated_pressure, product_date, life_cycle, connect_device, device_new_value, device_origin_value, account_id, device_type_id,certificate
mapper.select: select ip from device where id = #{id}

select d.chinese_name, d.english_name, d.asset_code, d.rated_uph, d.rated_voltage, d.rated_power, d.rated_pressure, d.product_date, d.life_cycle,d.device_new_value, d.device_origin_value,r.run_time runtime,a.nickname nickname from device d LEFT JOIN device_performance r ON d.id=r.device_id LEFT JOIN account a ON r.malfuntion_person_id = a.id ORDER BY d.id ASC limit #{page},#{count}

SELECT d.asset_code, d.chinese_name, d.english_name, d.rated_uph, d.status_id, p.run_time FROM device d LEFT JOIN device_performance p ON d.id = p.device_id WHERE d.device_type_id =#{deviceId} ORDER BY asset_code DESC limit #{page},#{count}
mapper.insert: insert into device (id, chinese_name, english_name, asset_code, rated_uph, rated_voltage, rated_power, rated_pressure, product_date, life_cycle, connect_device, device_new_value, device_origin_value, account_id, device_type_id,certificate ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ratedUPH,jdbcType=REAL}, #{ratedVoltage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{ratedPower,jdbcType=REAL}, #{ratedPressure,jdbcType=REAL}, #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lifeCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{connectDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceNewValue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{deviceOriginValue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificate} )

insert into device
id,
chinese_name,
english_name,
asset_code,
rated_uph,
rated_voltage,
rated_power,
rated_pressure,
product_date,
life_cycle,
connect_device,
device_new_value,
device_origin_value,
account_id,
device_type_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ratedUph,jdbcType=REAL},
#{ratedVoltage,jdbcType=REAL},
#{ratedPower,jdbcType=REAL},
#{ratedPressure,jdbcType=REAL},
#{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lifeCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{connectDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceNewValue,jdbcType=REAL},
#{deviceOriginValue,jdbcType=REAL},
#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update device
chinese_name = #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_code = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rated_uph = #{ratedUph,jdbcType=REAL},
rated_voltage = #{ratedVoltage,jdbcType=REAL},
rated_power = #{ratedPower,jdbcType=REAL},
rated_pressure = #{ratedPressure,jdbcType=REAL},
product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
life_cycle = #{lifeCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
connect_device = #{connectDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_new_value = #{deviceNewValue,jdbcType=REAL},
device_origin_value = #{deviceOriginValue,jdbcType=REAL},
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status_id = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update device set chinese_name = #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_code = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rated_uph = #{ratedUPH,jdbcType=REAL}, rated_voltage = #{ratedVoltage,jdbcType=REAL}, rated_power = #{ratedPower,jdbcType=REAL}, rated_pressure = #{ratedPressure,jdbcType=REAL}, product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, life_cycle = #{lifeCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, connect_device = #{connectDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_new_value = #{deviceNewValue,jdbcType=REAL}, device_origin_value = #{deviceOriginValue,jdbcType=REAL}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
